GenericConnectorDescriptor.description: The SAP S4 OData v2 connector supports a rich set of features including deep queries to join child object types, support for E-Tag version control and the X-CSRF security tokens. More information regarding S4 APIs are available at https://help.sap.com/viewer/44e06f22436c43e582db6ccd5250e29b

field.label: Server Endpoint URL
field.helpText: SAP S/4HANA URL

field.label: User Name
field.helpText: User name for Basic Authentication. Leave blank for other authenticate types.

field.label: Password
field.helpText: Password for Basic Authentication. Leave blank for other authenticate types.

field.label: Client Number
field.helpText: Required for non SAP S/4HANA Cloud System

field.label: Test Connection Service (Optional)
field.helpText: SAP S/4HANA OData API to be used to test connection

field.label: SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog
field.helpText: Choose a service to use from the list of SAP/S4 services

allowedValue.label: Activity Type Plan Cost Rates - ACCOSTRATE (C_ACTYTYPEPLANCOSTRATE_SRV_0001)
G/L Account Balance with Flow - Measure (C_GLACCOUNTFLOW_SRV_0001)
Gateway Project for Functional Area Hierarchy View (C_FUNCTIONALAREAHIERNODE_SRV_0001)
KPIs based on G/L Account Flow (C_GLACCOUNTFLOWKPI_CDS_0001)
Lean Service for Writing Plan Data to ACDOCP (API_FINPLANNINGDATA_SRV_0001)
Operational Accounting Document Header and Item (API_OPLACCTGDOCITEMCUBE_SRV_0001)
Sales Order Bill of Material CRUD API (API_ORDER_BILL_OF_MATERIAL_SRV_0001)

field.label: Custom SAP S/4 OData API
field.helpText: Enter the SAP S/4HANA OData API if not listed in the Service Catalog. This API will be used instead of the selection in the SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog

field.label: Maximum Entity Depth for Deep Get
field.helpText: Specifies the maximum depth to include child objects in the profile.

field.label: Extra URL Query Parameters
field.helpText: Additional Filtering parameters associated with $expand and $select. Refer to SAP documentation for the specific API for relevant parameters. Do not include a leading ? nor &. For example: $expand=XXX,YYY

field.label: SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog
field.helpText: Choose a service to use from the list of SAP/S4 services

allowedValue.label: Activity Type Plan Cost Rates - ACCOSTRATE (C_ACTYTYPEPLANCOSTRATE_SRV_0001)
G/L Account Balance with Flow - Measure (C_GLACCOUNTFLOW_SRV_0001)
Gateway Project for Functional Area Hierarchy View (C_FUNCTIONALAREAHIERNODE_SRV_0001)
KPIs based on G/L Account Flow (C_GLACCOUNTFLOWKPI_CDS_0001)
Lean Service for Writing Plan Data to ACDOCP (API_FINPLANNINGDATA_SRV_0001)
Operational Accounting Document Header and Item (API_OPLACCTGDOCITEMCUBE_SRV_0001)
Sales Order Bill of Material CRUD API (API_ORDER_BILL_OF_MATERIAL_SRV_0001)

field.label: Custom SAP S/4 OData API
field.helpText: Enter the SAP S/4HANA OData API if not listed in the Service Catalog. This API will be used instead of the selection in the SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog

field.label: Maximum Browse Depth
field.helpText: Specifies the maximum depth to include child objects in the profile

field.label: Include recursive navigations
field.helpText: Include deep navigations to that circle back to parent object types types. For example allow Order->Order_Details->Order.

field.label: Page Size
field.helpText: Specifies the number of documents to retrieve with each page transaction.

field.label: Maximum Documents
field.helpText: Limits the number of documents returned. If value is less than 1, all records are returned.

field.label: Allow Field Selection
field.helpText: Allow individually fields to be selected. Otherwise field selection is only to choose what related child entities to expand and include in the response along with all the fields for each selected entity. Specifying individual fields to return requires large API calls and should only be used when relatively few fields are required.

field.label: SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog
field.helpText: Choose a service to use from the list of SAP/S4 services

allowedValue.label: Activity Type Plan Cost Rates - ACCOSTRATE (C_ACTYTYPEPLANCOSTRATE_SRV_0001)
G/L Account Balance with Flow - Measure (C_GLACCOUNTFLOW_SRV_0001)
Gateway Project for Functional Area Hierarchy View (C_FUNCTIONALAREAHIERNODE_SRV_0001)
KPIs based on G/L Account Flow (C_GLACCOUNTFLOWKPI_CDS_0001)
Lean Service for Writing Plan Data to ACDOCP (API_FINPLANNINGDATA_SRV_0001)
Operational Accounting Document Header and Item (API_OPLACCTGDOCITEMCUBE_SRV_0001)
Sales Order Bill of Material CRUD API (API_ORDER_BILL_OF_MATERIAL_SRV_0001)

field.label: Custom SAP S/4 OData API
field.helpText: Enter the SAP S/4HANA OData API if not listed in the Service Catalog. This API will be used instead of the selection in the SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog

field.label: Child Creation Mode
field.helpText: Specify how child entities will be handled. 'Link Children' allows mapping key fields to indicate which existing child entities to link to. 'Create Children' allows for both the parent and child entity types to be created if supported by the SAP S4 Entity Type. For example A_BusinessPartner supports deep create. Otherwise only the keys for child entities can be specified to link to those existing entities.

allowedValue.label: Create Children (Must be supported by API for this Object Type)

field.label: Fetch X-CSRF and SAP_SESSIONID
field.helpText: X-CSRF Token and SAP_SESSIONID_COOKIE will be retrieved automatically and used in the Operation

field.label: Maximum Entity Depth for Deep Create
field.helpText: Specifies the maximum depth to include child objects in the profile. This enables the implementation of 'Create with Deep Payload' for entities that support deep create operations.

field.label: SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog
field.helpText: Choose a service to use from the list of SAP/S4 services

allowedValue.label: Activity Type Plan Cost Rates - ACCOSTRATE (C_ACTYTYPEPLANCOSTRATE_SRV_0001)
G/L Account Balance with Flow - Measure (C_GLACCOUNTFLOW_SRV_0001)
Gateway Project for Functional Area Hierarchy View (C_FUNCTIONALAREAHIERNODE_SRV_0001)
KPIs based on G/L Account Flow (C_GLACCOUNTFLOWKPI_CDS_0001)
Lean Service for Writing Plan Data to ACDOCP (API_FINPLANNINGDATA_SRV_0001)
Operational Accounting Document Header and Item (API_OPLACCTGDOCITEMCUBE_SRV_0001)
Sales Order Bill of Material CRUD API (API_ORDER_BILL_OF_MATERIAL_SRV_0001)

field.label: Custom SAP S/4 OData API
field.helpText: Enter the SAP S/4HANA OData API if not listed in the Service Catalog. This API will be used instead of the selection in the SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog

field.label: Prefetch E-Tag
field.helpText: E-Tag will be retrieved and passed to the specific operation

field.label: SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog
field.helpText: Choose a service to use from the list of SAP/S4 services

allowedValue.label: Activity Type Plan Cost Rates - ACCOSTRATE (C_ACTYTYPEPLANCOSTRATE_SRV_0001)
G/L Account Balance with Flow - Measure (C_GLACCOUNTFLOW_SRV_0001)
Gateway Project for Functional Area Hierarchy View (C_FUNCTIONALAREAHIERNODE_SRV_0001)

Operational Accounting Document Header and Item (API_OPLACCTGDOCITEMCUBE_SRV_0001)
Sales Order Bill of Material CRUD API (API_ORDER_BILL_OF_MATERIAL_SRV_0001)

field.label: Custom SAP S/4 OData API
field.helpText: Enter the SAP S/4HANA OData API if not listed in the Service Catalog. This API will be used instead of the selection in the SAP S/4HANA Service Catalog

field.label: Prefetch E-Tag
field.helpText: E-Tag will be retrieved and passed to the specific operation

dynamicProperty.label: ETag/Document Version Number (Required for UPDATE operations)
dynamicProperty.helpText: The E-Tag/version number to be sent with the entity/document update. This needs to be acquired from the ETAG document property returned by a GET operation. If the version number sent does not match the version number of the currently persisted version, the operation will fail. If the version number is excluded, a 403 Forbidden error will occur.

dynamicProperty.label: X-CSRF Token (Required for write operations)
dynamicProperty.helpText: This token is fetched by any GET operation. This value must be used to set the X-CSRF Token Document Property for any write operations otherwise a 403 Forbidden Error will occur.

dynamicProperty.label: SAP_SESSIONID_COOKIE (Required for write operations)
dynamicProperty.helpText: This cookie is fetched by any GET operation. This value must be used to set the SAP_SESSIONID_COOKIE Document Property for any write operations otherwise a 403 Forbidden Error will occur.

dynamicProperty.label: Extra URL Query Parameters
dynamicProperty.helpText: Additional Filtering parameters associated with $expand and $select. Refer to SAP documentation for the specific API for relevant parameters. Do not include a leading ? nor &. For example: $expand=XXX,YYY

trackedProperty.label: ETag/Document Version Number (Returned by GET operations)
trackedProperty.helpText: The E-Tag represents the current version of the entity/document

trackedProperty.label: X-CSRF Token (Returned by GET operations)
trackedProperty.helpText: This token is fetched by any GET operation. This value must be used to set the X-CSRF Token Document Property for any write operations otherwise a 403 Forbidden Error will occur.

trackedProperty.label: SAP_SESSIONID_COOKIE (Returned by GET operations)
trackedProperty.helpText: This cookie is fetched by any GET operation. This value must be used to set the SAP_SESSIONID_COOKIE Document Property for any write operations otherwise a 403 Forbidden Error will occur.
